channel.title: How do i edit the names of items?
channel.description:
Hi, im a newb at servers :P ive been messing around with stuff and decided to make edit armour :D im trying to make guthix>tempest (i made it up :P) heres the code: [code]item = 2413 Tempest_cape A_cape_from_the_almighty_Tempest.[/code] this is in item.cfg when i run the server (using zod scape) it dosnt change do i need to do anything else?
+ were or how do i use client.java? ty for ur help
~2hnderspeckr

item.title: How do i edit the names of items?
item.dc:creator: @jimsmi6 jimsmi6
item.description:
@jimsmi6 wrote:

I personally use XVI which can be downloaded here: http://www.chmaas.handshake.de/delphi/freeware/xvi32/xvi32.htm

Read full topic

item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

ok i dunno htf to use a hex editor even tho i got one (t search)
is that really a hex editor

item.source: How do i edit the names of items?

item.title: How do i edit the names of items?
item.dc:creator: @_Chaotic ~Chaotic~
item.description:
@_Chaotic wrote:

You cannot edit the names of items in your "Server File, You must edit it in the cache in your CLIENT, Like PaulT Said “You Need a Hex Editor”.

Edit: This was already posted -.-

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit the names of items?

item.title: How do i edit the names of items?
item.dc:creator: @2hnderspeckr 2hnderspeckr
item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

i guess when im better at doing it i will be able to.
how would i be able to download hamachi, without needing to be admin to install it. (my dads really strict! he dosnt like me downloading stuff, but dosnt kno what im downloading, but i do)
he knows nothing about moparscape or hamachi.
any1?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit the names of items?

item.title: How do i edit the names of items?
item.dc:creator: @jimsmi6 jimsmi6
item.description:
@jimsmi6 wrote:

First off, the noob who recommended ItemHandler doesn’t know shit about servers. You cannot edit item names, put simply. The only possible way is using a client, an open source one, and editting the cache. Which is very hard to explain and requires a hex editor. I’d just leave it alone if I were you.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit the names of items?

im confused, im using zod scape as the sorce, it runs smoothly, just without anything edited.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 06:23:34 AM[/size][hr]
theirs another pic[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 06:56:18 AM[/size][hr]anybody

Read full topic

item.title: How do i edit the names of items?
item.dc:creator: @2hnderspeckr 2hnderspeckr
item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

oh and also for java thing, search in it with all files and things in your server folder, and type in client.java.

:? what lol
ill get a screenie[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 04:51:12 PM[/size][hr][quote=“PaulT, post:6, topic:41478”][quote]were would i find itemhandler? i found it in java folder, but its too small[/quote]

Maybe it’s item.cfg your looking for?

A hex editor is something you can find on google (axe hex editor works well). You can use it to directly edit your RS data files.[/quote]

tried already i said at top
i do have t search, but that might not be any use[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 04:52:10 PM[/size][hr]picture time [br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 05:04:39 PM[/size][hr]already stopped the server + saved the file
